titleStmt.title: A most strange and rare example of the iust iudgement of God executed vpon a lewde and wicked coniurer the .xvij. day of Ianuarie. M.D.Lxxvij. In the parish church of S. Mary Oueris in Southwark, in the presence of diuers credible [and] honest persons
titleStmt.author: Pembroke, Simon.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
